#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy
= Build Server=

The build server is located at http://builds.dxhardcore.com.

Contributors please contact Dan Gilkerson to obtain more privledges.

= Assembly Info =

Plugins use the following format for versioning

{{{
<CodeRush version compiled on>.<Build>.<VCS rev>

Example: 9.2.4.450
}}}

The build system will replace the version information in assemblyinfo files it finds. Feel free to fill in the other attributes.

= New Plugin =

Currently there's no automated way to get a build configuration for a new plugin. Please contact Dan Gilkerson to add one.

= Download =

You can download the binaries at http://plugins.dxhardcore.com
